Description: For sale is a 2015 Gibson Memphis 1952 ES-295 in a beautiful Sixties Cherry with the original case and certificate of authenticity. This guitar is in excellent condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches, a couple dings, and a small surface crack on the top layer of the cutaway. This is pretty common and is supported by the block so it's not going to spread. Overall, I would give it a solid 8.5 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case is in excellent condition and works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.69" 1st Fret: 0.87" 9th Fret: 1.02" Neck Type: Soft "C" Finger Board: Rosewood Pickups: Original Weight: 6lb 12oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart. I have provided tons of pictures. Please check them out. Utah residents please add 7.05% sales tax. Please call, text, or message me if you have any questions 18013179013. This item does ship worldwide. All items are shipped with full insurance and signature confirmation so there is no risk for you the buyer. I am very familiar with shipping internationally. This item will be packed very safe and secure. International buyers are responsible for any import duties. International purchases will ship UPS.
